about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Dhruv Wellness Ltd is engaged in the business of wholeselling and distributorship of general, pharmaceutical and cosmetic products. They also functions as a stockist of medical, general cosmetics and pharmaceutical products. The company serves retailers, wholesalers and other clients.

They have worked with many renowned distributors in cosmetic and pharma sectors and all of which supply different line of products to the Company. The product ranges from small sachets of shampoos and other toiletries to pharmaceutical products that become a part of every household. Their products are distributed among an extensive chain of retailers across the area starting from Jogeshwari to Dhanu in Mumbai. They have constituted a widespread tie-up with general and medical stores in Mumbai's suburban areas.

faqs.question: What is the Dhruv Wellness IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dhruv Wellness IPO is a SME IPO of 2784000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.57 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on August 31, 2017, and closes on September 4, 2017.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dhruv Wellness IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dhruv Wellness IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dhruv Wellness IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dhruv Wellness IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dhruv Wellness IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Dhruv Wellness IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Dhruv Wellness IPO opens on August 31, 2017 and closes on September 4, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Dhruv Wellness IPO?
faqs.answer: Dhruv Wellness IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dhruv Wellness IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dhruv Wellness IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
